name: Dogthrow Duo
description:
"Meet Dax and Emily Dogthrow, bounty hunters extraordinaire! Use their blasters and mighty throwing arms to fend off the lobster onslaught!"

A TWO player game! Play with keyboard + controller or with two controllers! Two controllers is ideal. (XBOX 360 controllers recommended).

CODE: Ian Campbell (@BootdiskRev)

ART: Justin Chan (@justinchans)

AUDIO: Joonas Turner (@KissaKolme)

Made at TOJAM9 in 30 hours over 3 days! Hope you enjoy! :)

Check out Ian's other games: LINK
Check out Justin's art: LINK

Huge thanks to people who have donated, we really really appreciate it!
